description: Try our easy to follow Ricotta, Salmon & Zucchini Pikelets With Roasted Capsicum Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ricotta, Salmon & Zucchini Pikelets With Roasted Capsicum Salsa
name: Ricotta, Salmon & Zucchini Pikelets With Roasted Capsicum Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a 7cm-diameter heart-shaped cutter, carefully cut a heart from each pikelet. Serve pikelets with salsa and extra ricotta.
